00001 #include <epi.h>
00002 
00003 void
00004 epi_location_timer(epi_state * state, tw_lp * lp)
00005 {
00006         epi_agent        *a;
00007 
00008         // state->tmr_remove fired, so reset time to next lowest agent
00009         // Note that queue may be empty because the only agent in this location died.
00010         if(NULL != (a = pq_top(state->pq)))
00011         {
00012                 if(state->tmr_remove && state->tmr_remove->memory)
00013                         tw_error(TW_LOC, "Membuf on state->tmr_remove!");
00014 
00015                 if(!state->tmr_remove || state->tmr_remove == lp->pe->cur_event)
00016                         state->tmr_remove = rn_timer_init(lp, a->ts_next);
00017                 else
00018                         state->tmr_remove =
00019                                 rn_timer_reset(lp, &state->tmr_remove, a->ts_next);
00020         } else
00021                 state->tmr_remove = NULL;
00022 }
